definition: paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: Jonathan's good at wall-papering but he's not so handy with a paintbrush.
sentences.chinese: 乔纳森善于糊墙纸，但不善于使用漆刷。

sentences.english: The white wall was overworked with wallpaper.
sentences.chinese: 用墙纸装饰的白色墙壁。

sentences.english: His recent product, the high-tech light-emitting wallpaper, assures us of a revitalizing recovery.
sentences.chinese: 他的最新产品是高科技发光墙纸，保证让你恢复活力。

sentences.english: They decorated the room with green paint and a gold paper.
sentences.chinese: 他们用绿色油漆和金色墙纸装饰房间。

sentences.english: Be like suffer sootiness and make partial wall paper becomes yellow, criterion appropriate is wiped with fluid of attenuant caustic soda.
sentences.chinese: 若受烟熏而使部分墙纸变黄，则宜用稀释烧碱液擦拭。

sentences.english: Red flocked wallpaper and a Victorian decor set the tone.
sentences.chinese: 全红的墙纸和维多利亚时代风格的装修决定了情调。

sentences.english: The room was papered in green.
sentences.chinese: 这墙是用糊墙纸裱糊的。

sentences.english: 8The wallpaper has a pretty blue design.
sentences.chinese: 糊墙纸上有美丽的蓝色图案。

sentences.english: No painting or wallpapering of the wall panel is allowed.
sentences.chinese: 不得在展位墙板上涂刷油漆或黏贴墙纸。

sentences.english: The rooms were cleaned and wallpapered.
sentences.chinese: 反正我们也打算给那个房间贴墙纸的。
家具给糊墙纸衬得不好看了。

sentences.english: The Coronata wallpaper lends a formal air to the dining room.
sentences.chinese: 科罗娜塔墙纸给餐厅增添了一种整齐有致的气氛。

sentences.english: The basic principle of autostereogram is so-called" wallpaper effect".
sentences.chinese: 立体画的基本原理就是“墙纸效应”。

sentences.english: This new wallpaper really glamorizes the living room!
sentences.chinese: 新的墙纸真的美化这个起居室。

definition: cupboard/cupboard that can also be used as a table/sideboard
